FuncDef:
The lease command sets the lease period of an IP address pool. If the lease period is 0, it indicates that it is unlimited(the actual value in the interaction paket is 4294967295).
The undo lease command restores the default setting.
By default, an IP address pool can be leased for 3 days.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the number of days.
The value is an integer that ranges from 0 to 999. The default value is 3.

Specifies the number of hours.
The value is an integer that ranges from 0 to 23. The default value is 0.

Specifies the number of minutes.
The value is an integer that ranges from 0 to 59. The default value is 0.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
Use this command to configure leases of IP addresses in the address pool so that different client can get IP addresses with different leases.
This command is inapplicable for remote servers.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
